Name: ШП - ShP
About the game: Incomprehensible interface errative puzzle game. No instructions! This product includes 3 different puzzles. Features: - Native Windows Forms interface. - The goal of each of these errative puzzle games is to set all the flags and then perform the final control activation, typically a scrollbar movement. - All the flags are hinted in a message box which is shown by pressing a certain button in a previously unknown place. - Every game has a way to close itself unexpectedly - this is a gameover and you have to restart it manually. - Some controls reset your progress, but sometimes it is necessary to advance. - In the end, the game also closes itself. There is only one way to finish each puzzle. ШП-7: ГАМЕБОЕ ПЕРЕЛЬНИЦА Release: sometime around 2008 Re-release: 15.07.2011 22:33 Clicks to solve: 1 for the first window, 54 for the second, 14 for the third. ШП-8 и ШП-87 Release: 26.07.2011 13:43 Clicks to solve: ШП-8: 41 ШП-87: 9 ШП-87 is available when you launch ШП-8 with ШП-7 already launched. ШП-9 Release: 28.07.2011 0:00 / 17.06.2011 21:31 (some kind of a time paradox) Clicks to solve: ???
